page.title: 06Gardening In Thorpe Hesley
page.content: A very important part of our home life is our garden.In our garden we grow vegetables,flowers,trees,herbs and fruit.Some people still use horse manure to improve their gardens.The main problem is too much clay in the soil.This causes drainage difficulties but it is still good soil for growing.We can improve drainage by using gravel and small stones to the soil.Pollution in the rain causes weak acid in the soil but we use slug pellets and washing up liquid to kill greenfly and blackfly.We have barbecues in our gardens on sunny days and we sit on benches or sun loungers. We decorate our gardens with gnomes,ponds,waterfalls,wells and statues.We mark boundaries with fences wire netting and hedges.
